note:
Hello! I am interested in mathematics, theoretical computer science, infosec, anarchism, demoscene and LGBT+ issues (among many other tangential topics). If it sounds like we have something in common then feel free to follow. I will follow you back.

I also automatically post links to articles from Slashdot's "Your Rights Online" RSS feed from this account (approximately 2 articles per day). These articles primarily pertain to security and privacy on the internet.
